name: I Came Home to Ghosts!
description:
I Came Home to Ghosts!
Timmy goes to school as he did every other day, but returns home to an empty house, and a note from his lousy parents. Timmy's family have left him behind a blaster; along with an angry horde of ghosts. Can he survive? Or will the ghosts prove to be too much for Timmy to handle?

BEST EXPERIENCED WITH HEADPHONES

This game focuses particularly on 'Game Feel', and what 'Juicy Elements' can make a game more immersive and fun to play.

Download .exe file to play
